00015 CvPoint FloorModel::coordsReal2Floor(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00016         CvPoint pf = cvPoint((int)(w*(p.x-floormin.x)/(floormax.x-floormin.x)),
00017                                 (int)(h*(p.y-floormin.y)/(floormax.y-floormin.y)));
00018         return pf;
00019 }
00020 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 CvPoint FloorModel::coordsReal2Floor(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00022         CvPoint pf = cvPoint((int)(w*(p.x-floormin.x)/(floormax.x-floormin.x)),
00023                                 (int)(h*(p.y-floormin.y)/(floormax.y-floormin.y)));
00024         return pf;
00025 }
00026 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027  CvPoint3D32f FloorModel::coordsFloor2Real(CvPoint p) {
00028         return cvPoint3D32f(
00029                 floormin.x+p.x*(floormax.x-floormin.x)/w,
00030                 floormin.y+p.y*(floormax.y-floormin.y)/h,
00031                 0);
00032 }
00033 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 CvSize FloorModel::sizeReal2Floor(CvSize2D32f s) {
00035         CvSize axes = cvSize((int)(w*s.width/(floormax.x-floormin.x)),
00036                                 (int)(h*s.height/(floormax.y-floormin.y)));
00037         return axes;
00038 }
00039 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 bool FloorModel::InBounds(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00041         if (p.x > floormax.x || p.x < floormin.x 
00042                 || p.y > floormax.y || p.y < floormin.y )
00043                 return false;
00044         return true;
00045 }
00046 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 bool FloorModel::InBounds(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00048         if (p.x > floormax.x || p.x < floormin.x 
00049                 || p.y > floormax.y || p.y < floormin.y )
00050                 return false;
00051         return true;
00052 }
00053 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 void FloorModel::GetMinMaxXY(CvPoint2D32f& cammin, CvPoint2D32f& cammax) {
00055         // find 3D coordinates of 4 image corners on the floor
00056         CvPoint3D32f p = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPointTo32f(m_extreme[0]), 0);
00057         cammin.x = p.x; cammin.y = p.y; cammax.x = p.x; cammax.y = p.y;
00058         for (int i=1;i<m_extreme.GetCount();i++) {
00059                 p = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPointTo32f(m_extreme[i]), 0);
00060                 cammin.x = min(p.x, cammin.x); cammin.y = min(p.y, cammin.y);
00061                 cammax.x = max(p.x, cammax.x); cammax.y = max(p.y, cammax.y);
00062         }
00063 }
